snippet: Christine C. Quinn has the support of 25 percent of voters polled, but that is not enough to avoid a runoff in the Sept. 10 primary election.
abstract: Trailside blog; latest New York Times/Siena College poll shows that City Council Speaker Christine C Quinn is leading in Democratic primary for New York City mayor.
lead_paragraph: Christine C. Quinn has the support of 25 percent of voters polled, but that is not enough to avoid a runoff in the Sept. 10 primary election.

headline.main: Quinn Leads Democratic Candidates for Mayor, Poll Finds
headline.print_headline: Quinn Leads Democrats In Mayoral Race, Poll Finds
